title: How to Spread Pizza Dough

steps.headline: Dust your rolling pin and pizza dough with flour.
Start rolling the dough in a front and back motion
Rotate the dough or the rolling pin so that it gets spread from all sides into a circle.
steps.description: Be patient and keep working. The dough will tend to spring back as you work. Work until the circle is a little bigger around than your pan.

steps.headline: Using your hands, take the edges of the pizza dough and fold or roll them under a little bit to form the edges of the crust.
steps.description: Your pizza dough has been spread.

text: Dust your rolling pin and pizza dough with flour.  Start rolling the dough in a front and back motion  Rotate the dough or the rolling pin so that it gets spread from all sides into a circle. Be patient and keep working. The dough will tend to spring back as you work. Work until the circle is a little bigger around than your pan. Using your hands, take the edges of the pizza dough and fold or roll them under a little bit to form the edges of the crust. Your pizza dough has been spread.
